LanguageData.ImprovedAutoSlaughter.Tip: Old animals are slaughtered first from oldest to youngest, then other animals from youngest to oldest, then pregnant animals from most recent to least recent pregnancy.
LanguageData.ImprovedAutoSlaughter.HeaderTooltipCurre: The current number of all males in the colony.
LanguageData.ImprovedAutoSlaughter.HeaderTooltipMaxMa: The maximum number of all males in the colony.\n\nHandlers will automatically slaughter any extras.
LanguageData.ImprovedAutoSlaughter.HeaderTooltipCurre: The current number of all females in the colony.
LanguageData.ImprovedAutoSlaughter.HeaderTooltipMaxFe: The maximum number of all females in the colony.\n\nHandlers will automatically slaughter any extras.
LanguageData.ImprovedAutoSlaughter.OldLifeExpectancyT: Specifies a percentage of animal's life expectancy as the threshold when the animal is considered to be too old and prioritized for slaughtering.
LanguageData.ImprovedAutoSlaughter.NoAutoSlaughterDes: If marked, this animal will not be auto-slaughtered.\nIt will still be included in counting.
